amendment.description: Amendment redirects $1 million in funding within the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service for the study of captive marine mammals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $1 million in funding within the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service for the study of captive marine mammals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Schiff.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
